issues: CRITICAL: Major coordinate discrepancy - 149.79 km difference between asserted coordinates (43.0995, -89.4045) and geocoded location (44.4308975, -89.6884637)

Inferred soil type (Luvisols) not typical for aquatic lake water samples - indicates potential georeferencing issue
Weather data sourced from distant station (31.7 km away) reduces confidence in environmental context
Sample collection site 'lake surface water' lacks specificity for depth or exact sampling location within the lake
recommendations: URGENT: Verify and correct coordinate accuracy - check if coordinates (43.0995, -89.4045) actually correspond to Lake Mendota sampling location

Consider updating geo_loc_name to be more specific (e.g., 'USA: Wisconsin, Lake Mendota, Madison') to better match coordinates
